website_summaries.verdict: This scraper has a good reach but lacks the durability needed to handle tough ice and snow.
pros: Broom can push heavy snow off before you scrape
cons: Telescoping handle has been known to break when put to hard use

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed, Broke the second day
customer_reviews.text: It worked first day... broke the second ☹️..... extremely disappointed.....
customer_reviews.author: Renju Nair

customer_reviews.title: The video is not this model
customer_reviews.text: The video on the page is of a different model one that telescopes and adjusts. What I received is no more than a piece of cheap foam attached by nothing more than a plastic screw in two three thin metal poles held together by nothing more than pressure buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Broke on FIRST USE!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a few weeks ago and just had our first snowfall in which to test it. The head snapped off of the first stage of metal pole under VERY light load. This was NOT pushing any heavy snow or ice - and the thing just snapped off. I'm very disappointed, as I really wanted to love this product. I'm hoping that there's a return policy under which I can get this replaced.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Roush

customer_reviews.title: seems like a different model
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3. Not as pictured, seems like a different model. VERY WEAK built, already tried to use it once and it seems like its going to break any sec. I have ordered this in the past maybe 1 or 2 years ago and I still use it but the new 3 I got couple days ago is different. One already has a crack and other one the bar twist isnt working correctly seems broken. Not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: Check it works as soon as you receive it. I didn't.
customer_reviews.text: 1 star for the fact that the handle didn't open up - it remained in the unextended position, which is not what it's intended for. Trouble is I bought this back in Spring '17 because the one I had was really good but wearing out, and it's now Jan '18 so I doubt I'll get a refund. SO IF YOU GET ONE CHECK IT WORKS STRAIGHT OUT THE BOX.
customer_reviews.author: elektrapops

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice so far and I’m impressed. Sent the link to my friend and he ended up fine one as well. Product update. I used Snow Joe A total of 3 times and the telescoping mechanism no longer works, so you can’t tighten it which makes it not usable. Update: just got off the phone with Amazon and they are sending me a new snow Job free of charge. Amazon is ROCKS!
customer_reviews.author: Scott H

customer_reviews.title: Broke first use
customer_reviews.text: The pole snapped in half, the foam came loose and started to rip away. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dimos8890

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the first season. Used it maybe 10 times. First snow of the second season, was pushing some snow of the roof of my car and it snapped. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michi

customer_reviews.title: in that sense this product is great. However their are issues which need to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a replacement to my conventional snow brush, which I had noticed was leaving minor sratch marks on my cars paint. The snow Joe does in fact reduce/ eliminate scratch marks, in that sense this product is great. However their are issues which need to be addressed in order to make this a great overall product. The Snow Joe is screwed on to the telescoping handle, if pressure is applied downward when removing snow it becomes loosened. Having to do the multiple times in the freezing cold is really annoying and a waste of time. I recommend that the snow Joe and telescoping handle be permanently attached with a tilt mechanism added for easier storage.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Rolon Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Speeds up clearing the snow off the cars
customer_reviews.text: Much faster than my old method - a telescoping window cleaner (the ones with the rubber on one side and the scrubber on the other). It was one of those twist to lock telescoping things...which meant it collapsed almost every time it hit resistance. The Snow Joe however, has the locking metal tabs and you screw in the handle to the head. I found it hard to get the head back off the handle after use, but I had the 3 piece handle version - the interlocking metal tabs/buttons (?) work much better, no collapsing of the handle. The head is long enough to push a lot at once.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Made quick work of clearing snow off SUV
customer_reviews.text: I recently used Snow Joe to remove about 6 inches of very heavy, wet snow from my medium-sized SUV. I left the center bar off, making the whole Snow Joe shorter. That made the roof a little harder to do, but it gave me better leverage as I’m not that strong. Sometimes I pushed, sometimes I pulled, and within minutes the car was cleared off. The pole loosened a little from the scraper end, but once I tightened it well, that didn’t happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Telescopic pole does not work / tighten, Ice scrapper fell off the second I touched it. The snow scraper part is good. I will attach it to a broom pole. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: no

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Clearing a dusting of snow off your car is not an issue. It takes a minute or two. Clearing a foot or more off the car is laborious, especially if you're shorter than 5'5", which I am. The Snow Joe is a must have. It makes clearing a foot of snow off your car as easy as if it were an inch. They have been on the market for a while now and the first time I used mine, I got mad at myself for sleeping on it for so long. It might actually be the best $10 I ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Daenaface

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing even heavy snow.  Not durable ice scraper.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing for pushing/pulling snow from my van. Works great and the extra-long collapsible handle allows me to reach from one side of the vehicle to the other with little effort. The snow remover is, however, rigid and rather large making it less than ideal for detail work around side mirrors or curved surfaces. The ice scraper held up for one use and ended up with enough pitting that it doesn't do a very good job at removing ice any longer.
customer_reviews.author: CDoug

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I didn't get this years ago. It's literally the same as cleaning crumbs off your table with either a comb or a shovel, which one is obviously more efficient? I also love that it can be broken down into a convenient size. Watch the video, says it all.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Yang

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I bought this
customer_reviews.text: The telescoping arm does not tighten. I just spins instead to tightening up. I finally put a drop of glue in to keep it straight. Cannot use it to clean roof because it does not extend long enough. I am 4feet 8 inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for your Money
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing purchase that I left a review on U Tube as well as here. This is the best snow broom and so is their shovel. Will make winter shoveling and cleaning off the car so much easier. This snow broom is even better than the original ones and no sharp edges, adjustable pole, scraper in case you need it on the other end. The snow broom is an absolute must for those vertically challenged in order to clean off your car roof in no time. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Makes snow clean off a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool little tool to keep in the trunk. The "broom" part of it was MUCH larger than I was anticipating, so it does take up some space in the trunk even when its broken down. However, the last few snow falls, I was able to clean my entire roof off in 2 quick pushes of the Snow Joe, instead of spending 5 minutes with my brush trying to reach the middle of my car. One downfall: you really need to screw the pole into the base tightly, or it will just twist while you are trying to clean you car, but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C.

customer_reviews.title: Useless In More Than 1 Inch Of Snow
customer_reviews.text: I used mine after a snow storm and was so excited about how easy it was that I ordered one for my boyfriend. Later that night I cleared off my car when it had 4 inches of snow. It snapped. I contacted the company and was sent a replacement. When the second one arrived I was extra gentle with it as we'd gotten 6 inches the night before. It immediately snapped again. Love the idea of it. But unfortunately it's not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amber D.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is so great for clearing off a ton of snow in a hurry. I live in Michigan and I do not have a garage. This baby clears off inches of snow from my car in no time. I like being able to clear off the top of my car, too, so I'm not causing a safety hazard with tons of snow blowing off the top of my car on the highway. (The ice scraper on the other side is helpful, too.) I had not troubles with the telescoping handle. I'm able to extend it and compress it with no issues (and I'm just an average middle-aged woman with NO super-human strength). Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: LtiMi

customer_reviews.title: Sconsin (Wisconsin) winters
customer_reviews.text: Live in Sconsin, works great to get piled snow off my truck. Has a long enough handle which is really nice. Can clean all snow off from just one side of my vehicles. Nice wide foam head makes quick work pulling or pushing snow off windows and hood, etc.. My only concern is the durability of the foam head. Only time will tell how long it lasts. On the other hand, I already have in mind, some more sturdy materials I can replace it with if failure generates a "Houston, we've had a problem"!!
customer_reviews.author: Mac G.

customer_reviews.title: Separate Handle Pieces Won
customer_reviews.text: The buttons that connect the separate handle pieces are junk, which we discovered in the middle of a snowstorm. You push the button down, it does what it is supposed to do (goes down, pops back up when released). Once you slide the metal pipe over to connect the pieces, the button moves and gets stuck in the pipe, with no way to get it out, so there is nothing keeping the two pipes together. We ordered 2 and they both have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Midwesterner in Love
customer_reviews.text: Might be one of the best things I've ever purchased. I live in the Midwest and we got whomped by a significant amount of wet snow prior to Halloween. I watched all my neighbors struggling with messy brushes while I simply pushed the snow off with this handy tool. I started after some of my neighbors and was done before many of them. Love how compact it is. The ice scraper on the end is pretty basic and seems unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other scraper or brush!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously a game changer!! This is the only tool we needed to get us through the winter for getting snow off of our cars. Much more effective at pushing off show with the pad than those silly brushes. Some guy suggested it while we were shopping for windshield scrapers at Target. He said “don’t waste your money on these, seriously, buy a Snow Joe” so we bought one from my amazon app while talking to him... Best random recommendation from a stranger ever. Thanks guy at Target!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Roecker

customer_reviews.title: Snow Joe: Icebane - this winter's blockbuster hit
customer_reviews.text: It's so freaking good I got carried away and cleared the snow in front of my car with it as well. You can see in the pictures where it leaves its logo in the snow like a little snowplow that's all proud of itself. It's so sturdy I broke through to the dirt below the snow and didn't even notice. The little scraper on the end feels like it would be more useful if it was bigger. As it currently exists it's a bit awkward to use that part, maybe just because the pole is completely straight so you don't get the best angle.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: As many other one star reviews point out, this is a very bad quality product. For me, this item no longer telescopes (stuck at the smallest length) and the big blue foam portion often twists out from the pole during use. It's at the point where a regular brush with no length is more convenient than this troublesome devil. Although the design is nice, they need to improve on the quality to ensure the original design is carried out. Personally, I don't need the big, fat blue portion to dissemble - if they made that portion one piece, then half of my complaints would probably be null. Until then, I'll be looking for another contender for my snow problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy B.

customer_reviews.title: We have gotten snow a couple of times in the last few days and this works great for her
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got a new Rav4 a month ago and needed something longer to clear her car off. We have gotten snow a couple of times in the last few days and this works great for her. UPDATE: We got a large amount of snow yesterday. The handle snapped off! Conclusion - this works well if there is not a lot of snow to clear or you live in a area that doesn't get more than a couple of inches at a time. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of products for family. I bought this for my sister brand new very expensive SUV. My sister is very short and I wanted something she could use with ease while protecting her investment. Well she loved it! She called me raving how pleased she was & how easy it was to clear off her SUV. She even told me she was getting a lot of attention & feedback by others at her work. We laughed at how a simple Snow Brush made so much talk at her jobs parking lot. So for that I highly recommend this to all!
customer_reviews.author: Tester Guy 1

customer_reviews.title: WHERE HAS THIS BEEN ALL MY DRIVING LIFE???
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after old brushes keep falling apart of fraying after use year over year. First time using this and short of smaller areas...It worked perfectly. Only wish there was a smaller "snow scraper" version for the smaller easy to reach areas. Basically put together, use, and disassemble in minutes for storage. Cleared my entire SUV in just moments, whereas small snow brushes would have taken me about 5 - 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Suminski

customer_reviews.title: So sad, it broke
customer_reviews.text: Broke the very first time I went to use it. The plastic piece that holds the head part busted. Didn't even catch on anything to actually cause the break. Was so sad. Had to order another but different one😥
customer_reviews.author: Bambi grigsbyHildenbrandt

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Winter has passed so I wont get a chance to use it until next winter. I can review the construction though, The pipes are thin walled and will bend or crush easily. The pipes have overspray on the insides so when you insert/remove the sections the paint on outside of the pipes leaves deep scratches. I also had problems with the buttons that hold the sections together getting pushed into the pipes because there is nothing to hold them in place. The "broom" is nothing but Styrofoam. The handles put together do give it a long reach which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Very unintuitive telescoping function. Screw in plastic connection easy to over or under tighten and doesn't inspire confidence. Feels like it isn't going to last years. The lights are gimmicky IMO. They don't help much. 2nd time I've purchased a Sno Joe product and the second time I've been a little disappointed. If it lasts a year and feels solid I'll update it.
customer_reviews.author: testicular

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Doesn't scratch!
customer_reviews.text: This is something I saw on a shopping channel...and then looked it up on Amazon. I love this broom! I have no garage, so getting the snow off my car in the morning can be a chore. This feels lightweight and possibly "flimsy"...but I've been careful with it, and it does a good job! I can get all the snow off the roof quickly! Once the "big snow season" seemed to have passed, I unscrewed the handle so it would store more easily in the rear window area, because it does take up quite a bit of room when it's put together. But I found it very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: presbygirl

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Going through my closet I noticed that a box had fallen on the one I purchased 2 years ago. I bought a replacement I could not be happier with this product. It clears the snow off quickly and efficiently. Don't be fooled by the lightweight it really holds up to snow. I am an "older" lady and this snow broom makes quick work of even 12" of snow on your car. It just pushes right off with 1 hand. I purchased for my 2 sons as well. I am a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted one of these forever. It clears you car so much faster than a brush on a long handle. The brush also leaves little swirl marks all over the car because they're rough. But the sno joe is gentle on the car but clears it faster than any other type of tool. I wish the styrofoam was a little stronger. I'm sure after a while it's going to start ripping from scraping it over ice, but for now it does the job and for the price its perfect. I definitely reccomend it over using a brush style. It's like using a snow blower over a shovel.
customer_reviews.author: jla

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but easy to break the handle holders if you are not careful
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product many times this winter. It does well at quickly removing loose snow off a vehicle. Much easier and cleaner than those brushes. The reach of the Snow Joe is great and you can usually clear off most of the car from only one side. My only downside is that the clips that allow you to store the disassembled handle on the snow joe head break quite easily. Just pulling it back on my rear window and hitting my antenna caused one to break. Better the Snow Joe than my antenna I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Foley

customer_reviews.title: But if u want to clear snow in few strokes
customer_reviews.text: Just had a snow storm here in Seattle last week. Whipped this thing out the box and put together in less than a Minute. Very large soft cushioned squeegee end and great for clearing snow off your car quickly with few strokes. Will need to use your wipers for the last little bit remaining but this is a good product. Didn’t have very much ice to scrape but I’m sure it would’ve been a quick scrap with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning your car off so much easier
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time this morning to clean about 4-5 inches of fluffy snow off my car and my neighbor's car. It made cleaning off the roof and the whole car much faster. I have a small car but have shoulder problems so reaching the roof is difficult. This tool made it a breeze. I was able to clean the whole car off. I can't say if it would work with icy snow, but it sure made this morning easier.
customer_reviews.author: am1

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: Got these as gifts to add on at Christmas. I have been using mine for about three years now. Virginia snows are not always the deepest but a lot of the times it is wet snow and these tools make it a breeze to clean your car off in any type of snow even the deep stuff. I work at a rather large auto dealer and we use these at work the mechanics have to go get the cars off the lot to work on them which is many cars daily and they have not worn these sno joes out yet.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended! Easy to put together! Must have for snowy winter weather!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for people with tall vehicles (especially short people) and I love that it also has a scraper! I had NO problems putting it together like other people have stated! My husband and I both have one for our vehicles, and this was bought to carefully remove snow from our hot tub cover! Don't let the negative reviews sway your decision to order! I love this so much, I will be buying more to give as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Did an amazing job on our van and car
customer_reviews.text: This snow removal tool did an amazing job helping us push the snow off of our van and our car. The large size paddle really pushes the snow and doesn't scratch the paint on our cars. The scraper side is easy to use and the long pole helps us reach tricky spots. We're getting older and cleaning the snow and ice from our cars isn't as easy as it used to be and can actually be a little dangerous. The Snow Joe broom makes the job somewhat easier and safer than our old tools. We are happy with the performance and have recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever for clearing snow off the car
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever for clearing snow off the car.... the soft foam doesn't damage or scratch the paint, and it removes large quantities of snow in one sweep.... I learned about this product when I was watching the employees at a car dealership clearing snow off all the vehicles in the lot.... I was amazed at how fast... so I asked them... "Hey, what is that, and where did you get it".... the rest is history.
customer_reviews.author: MyTechGuyRI

customer_reviews.title: Compared to others, it falls short
customer_reviews.text: I have used a few snow brooms which all lasted 3-5 years; this one is inconvenient and bent after a few uses! The handle does not contract or detach easily, it must be unscrewed in two places otherwise you have a long handle sitting in the back of your vehicle. The tube then ended up bending after about 3 uses. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: applephx

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: My friend purchased one of these a few years ago. It was very easy to use but I wasn't sure I'd use it. BOY WAS I WRONG! It's lightweight and cleans off your car without any scratches! It also comes apart and easy to store when not in use so you can keep it in your car for convenience. I want to purchase one for everyone in my family. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Murray

customer_reviews.title: Best seasonal investment yet!
customer_reviews.text: Just moved to the Northeastern US and ended up purchasing a mid-sized SUV with no way to properly clean off the snow. This product helps me clear my vehicle almost entirely in minutes allowing me to push upwards of eight inches of heavy wet snow without collapsing the adjustable handle. With one winter complete, no noticeable wear or damage has occurred to the "broom".
customer_reviews.author: K. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and better than original brand.
customer_reviews.text: This knockoff is WAY better than the original. Telescoping handle AND a scrapie at the end?! Gamechanger. It was also $5 cheaper than the SnoBrum when I ordered which was a big factor for me. I've had one of these for 3 HARSH winters in Boston and have gotten these as gifts for most of my family. I'm nothing if not practical. They are well loved in Maine and New Hampshire alike.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: If you're the type that has issues putting things together, don't worry, this is a breeze. Each aluminum (3) clicks together and there is only one way to connect them. The one end has a ice scraper and the other screws into the blue head. This product is easy to use and does not harm your car's finish. If you want to take it apart, all the pieces simply click into the back of the blue head making it tiny to store for next season. A really good sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Dailey

customer_reviews.title: A snow product that works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: A coworker had one in the parking lot and cleared his car in minutes. Meanwhile my snow brush kept wiping out. This thing is a mini plow when it comes to car clearing. Even glazed snow is a non issue. Ice chipper on the back breaks the edges. Then you do a few shoves and icebergs come flying off. I used to spend 15-20 trying to clear my minivan. 5 minutes... 5 minutes to clear a minivan. Beyond happy with this product (bought a 2nd one for the wife).
customer_reviews.author: tech

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Easy
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect to use this in AK and have it last! It's not durable at all, first time using it and it broke and folded with .5 inches of snow.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: The snow broom works great and does not damage the car finish.
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I used it, the scraper cracked and will not stay on the handle. I called the company and they are sending a replacement out immediately. We did have sleet and ice after a few inches of snow so it was very difficult to deal with. The other part works great with the snow without damaging the finish on the car. I would definitely recommend this product and their customer service is awesome. You speak to a real person within a few minutes without having to listen to five minutes of options. Great company that definitely stands behind its products.
customer_reviews.author: B. SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Best snow removing product, hands down
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my personal car and at work to clear dozens of cars, wouldn't use anything else. Pushes a light dusting or a foot of snow off the car with no issues, your not going over the same spot 5 times to make it clear. It DOESNT scratch your car, unlike some this one has an ice scraper which you still need for the glass. Very easy to tigthten and loosen. I work at enterprise so when it snows I clear at least 20 cars, this is the best and quickest way to clear a car. Works amazingly for clearing roofs on sedans and SUVs.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: NOT the product promised -Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with this purchase. This product is not what they advertised. In the description and in the video, the poll can extend to a longer poll to reach further. IN FACT - what is delivered is a product with three unchangeable locking segments. Nothing twists to make it longer. I will never purchase anything from Snow Joe again!
customer_reviews.author: JOHNBGB

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: 2 snow storms so far and this pushed works well. Only issue I have is a concern that the plastic screw on the blade is not really sturdy so I am careful not to break it off pushing too hard. Take small bits and it is fine. I have good confidence this will not scratch your paint. Bottom line, works well but a bit of a concern of how sturdy it is
customer_reviews.author: Rf Foley

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. I'm short and its pretty hard for me to clean off the top of the car. With the extension of the Snow Broom I'm now able to clean the top, front and back of the car without a lot of effort. What also helps is the light on the end of the broom. This is especially useful in the early morning. There are several items that everyone should have in their car such as a flash light. Add this to the must have items in your car. I definitely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TravelLady

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for snowy climates.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good; I ordered this broom after some ice impregnated in my nylon snow brush left a series of scratches on the hood of my car. After about four inches of snow I took this broom out to put it through its paces, and it did a really great job. Much easier getting snow off the car with this broom as compared to a brush, and the soft foam really does seem very unlikely to leave any scratches behind (it definitely didn't on the first use). I'll update if there are any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jcto

customer_reviews.title: Best snow broom I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Snow removal is a breeze with this snow broom. Clean off the vehicle in more than 1/2 the time. Best I've ever used. Bought one for all my family members for Christmas. So easy to push off the snow. I use it fully extended since I'm 5'3" can clean the hood of my small suv in 2 passes. Even works great on my deck. As well. I'll never be without one from now one. Great product for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my truck and not worried about scratching my ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my truck and not worried about scratching my paint with dirt stuck in the brush of a typical snow brush. UPDATE: by the end of the year the poll bent trying to push snow of truck. Very cheep materials.
customer_reviews.author: Matches Malone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for New England winters
customer_reviews.text: Got this off my wishlist for Christmas and needed to use it immediately. My brother loved it so much I ordered him one and my mom who has a hard time reaching the top of her SUV to clear snow. Love the telescoping handle and that the head can detach for flatter storage. It’s a solid product that cleared 15+inches of snow off my minivan with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Dramaclass

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up...
customer_reviews.text: It came promptly, that was good. Gave it to my son for Christmas, he used it for a month and it snapped. Geuss the Upper Michigan winter is too much for it. My return window is closed so oh well, lesson learned. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dono

customer_reviews.title: Great snow remova tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the 4th one I bought. I got my boyfriend, sister, her spouse, and myself one for Christmas. My sister raves about how great it is, and so do I! I had to buy another because my car was stolen. This was the first thing I bought when I started replacing things! I tend to remove snow off my neighbors or colleagues cars, they think I'm really nice, I just do it because it's fun and easy
customer_reviews.author: Review Chick

customer_reviews.title: Works better than a brush!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Son prefers this one over the brush he has in his car. Easily removes snow from top of vehicle and sides. Would have been better if could attach all 3 and adjust size without removing one of the pieces and also if the handle had a longer foam piece to hold vs metal. Minnesota is cold and without gloves it's very cold to use. Now keep xtra pair gloves in car!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Okay Broom for a Cheap Price
customer_reviews.text: First of all, for about $13 this is not a bad product. However, with that in mind, don't expect this snow broom to last more than one winter. Pros: Cheap Extremely lightweight Large coverage area Cons: The plastic on the scraper is too soft and the edges are too round to scrape any more than a small amount of frost. The locking mechanism screws in the same way as the foam head, which can cause issues trying to adjust the handle. The locking mechanism will fail with too much force. The head screws on loosely, so it may loosen while in use.
customer_reviews.author: William S

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get the snow off my car
customer_reviews.text: I actually discovered this great tool from some information included in my Snow Joe snow blower. This is another great product from a great company. It makes removing large amounts of snow from the top of my car so easy. It’s light weight and stores easily. The only complaint is that the handle loostens a little too easy. I wish it would stay tight a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B. (Michigan)

customer_reviews.title: changed this rating from 5 to 3
customer_reviews.text: I downgraded this review after two winters because the handle does not stay open no matter how many times I forcefully turn it closed. It just keeps collapsing. It stores compactly and would be great except for the constant nuisance of having to constantly re extend the handle. Insofar as extending the handle initially it glided open with no pressure. I was concerned about that after reading several complaints. Perhaps the company opened and closed it before sending as people who had difficulty opening it also said it was only the first time. The head is very light and having brackets to store it is a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Greeneyes

customer_reviews.title: Cuts snow renoval time in half
customer_reviews.text: Love love this thing its not the fanciest thing but It does the trick when getting snow off my hood that I could never reach...one swipe and bam snows off....saves me so much time and now I dont get my coat wet standing on my tippy toes trying to reach all the snow on my hood...cuts snow removing time in half even on windows ..etc
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Soft Paws

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to the Snow Joe by another individual parked next to me at the train station. I used to use a broom but that wasn't great for the finish on the car. This product is ingenious! Easy to use, works well, and lasts. If you don't have one of these, I'd highly recommend for you and all family members.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper Martino

customer_reviews.title: Head came off
customer_reviews.text: Great product for getting snow off the car. Unfortunately when I was scraping off the car with the other end, I moved back and the head of the pusher end came clean off. That screw end should be more stable than that... Probably will have my friend rapid prototype a solid plastic replacement. Really should consider changing that part of the design.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G

customer_reviews.title: Fast snow remover from car Chicago
customer_reviews.text: This was one of purchase when we were packing for moving to Chicago (from California). I really wonder why I don't see many of these products in Chicago. I recommended this product to many friends here and everybody loves this. A must buy for people living in areas with average to heavy snow during winter. Save yourself a few minutes during crazy winter. If I get a chance to write a blog on our movement from Cali to Chicago, this will be included in shopping list for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Deepak Kumar

customer_reviews.title: ... to test it out and I must say I love it! used it on 3 cars and works ...
customer_reviews.text: just received this today with a light snow fall had to test it out and I must say I love it! used it on 3 cars and works great! took me minuets to do compared to using a broom. also used it on my hot tub cover and that was so fast. just ordered 3 more for family members which already want mine.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great. Better than snow brushes. Great company
customer_reviews.text: Cleared off the car in no time at all. The foam has a squeegee type effect. I had no problem opening the telescopic handle. When using it, however, although I locked in the handle, it would sometimes retract on its own. I went to the snowjoe website and chatted with them and they sent me a replacement, which arrived in 2 days!!! Fantastic customer service and the Snow broom works better than any brush that I have owned. You save time and the foam doesn't scratch the car. You might want to keep a brush in the car for tight area like the side mirrors (or just use your gloves).
customer_reviews.author: dot

customer_reviews.title: Throw away scraper and I mean throw away before you try to use it.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and the head unit works well on light snow as intended. However, it falls flat on it’s face When you try to use the scraper on ice, wearing after a couple of uses. In addition, the handle will not stay screwed into the head unit. (constantly loosens). Will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brian G. McKay

customer_reviews.title: Great way to clear snow but quality is an issue
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of snow this year in the NYC area and will never go back to using the old brush/scraper combo. Makes it much easier to cleanly clear snow off the SUV roof. One issue 5that the pole connects to the sweeper part and comes loose easily so need to keep tightening. I bought two units and the other won't stay tight at all. So quality control is an issue. Next time will probably get a different brand with better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wolnochok

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: I have a minivan, and this snow broom works very well to clean off the top of my van. The stiffness of the blade (thick, heavy duty Styrofoam) pulls even snow that is packed down by wind or because it is heavy, wet snow. The handle extends to help me reach at least halfway across on each side. This is a good quality snow broom. It got me through a real blizzard and other storms and is still in excellent shape. I expect it to last several years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: With the snow we've had in NYC the last couple of weeks this snow remover came in very handy. It took just a few minutes for me to clear off my sun. I would have given it 4 stars if the pole locked securely in place. While I'm pushing the snow off I can feel the pole turning so I have to hold it and give a little twist to keep the blue foam part from twisting off. Also, one of my poles does not extend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Krack

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I tend to get a good amount of snow at my home and this has been great to have. It works really well with lighter/fluffier snow. If the snow is a heavy/wetter snow them its a bit harder to use. The telescoping has been pushed back in on its self a time or two with heavier snow.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves his. He has a truck and it works perfect especially on top of the roof. I just picked one up for myself for my SUV and I haven’t had an opportunity to use it yet because we haven’t had much snow. I can’t wait to use it though. I used to work at an automobile dealership and we would use these all the time to clean the snow off of all the new cars as well as preowned vehicles. Now that I got a bigger SUV this will come in very handy especially with Northeast weather in the winter. Bought this is in 2017 and still have it in 2020
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great winter item!
customer_reviews.text: Great item for everyone who lives where it snows. Large foam head moves about 18 inches at a time so you can clean off the whole car in no time. I keep it in the trunk and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ball

customer_reviews.title: If its the fluffy stuff you will be good. Living in New England thought for some reason ...
customer_reviews.text: FYI do NOT buy this and think you will be able to scrape off your car or truck. This is a soft foam so it will in no way scrape any ice or hard snow build up on your car. If its the fluffy stuff you will be good. Living in New England thought for some reason our snow tends to be more icy than anything so it will be great to get the fuffy stuff that's on top of the ice off but not for the actual ice on the windows.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Invest in one!
customer_reviews.text: I only got to use this ONE time this winter, but it worked like a charm! I encourage everyone to invest in one of these so you can reach the snow on the roof of your cars (and you can clean the rest of your car off with ease). It's dangerous to leave a mound of snow on your car roof while you're driving around town or on highways. Maybe it's not dangerous for you, but it's certainly dangerous to the ppl driving behind you. Please be considerate and clean the top of your cars off--you can use this, or something like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great, but it needs space in your car
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very quick way to clear off your car. Best if you can keep the shaft together and not disassemble it. Easer to screw the shaft and blade together. I have a small car, but don't need the back seat much. So this works, just know that it takes a wile 2 or 3 minutes to repackage it so it fits under a seat. When your running late, and have to deal with snow, 2-3 minutes may feel way too long!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McGill

customer_reviews.title: Way Easier than a regular scraper!!
customer_reviews.text: The Snow Joe was super easy to use even with my bad shoulder. Very easy to take apart and saves a lot of time versus using a regular scraper. It made it very easy to remove the snow on the top of my SUV so that it wouldn’t impact drivers behind me. Great product! I’ll be purchasing one for my Mother for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Kris P

customer_reviews.title: Great in theory
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. The handle constantly turns and loosens. If it wasn't for that, this would be fantastic. I love that it doesn't scratch and it's easy to push quite a bit of snow (northern Michigan winter) off car or truck with ease. If they'd just fix that one flaw....
customer_reviews.author: Patty B

customer_reviews.title: Kind of cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I would not really recommend this snow scraper. Cheaply made light weight, i have seen a lot better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Montanarello

customer_reviews.title: If you live in a snowy area this is for you!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy about this product at an amazing price with quick shipping, I received this item during the winter time living in New York, winners are rock and this is saved me, time and such a hassle from happiness, get the snow off of my car, definitely will be purchasing again next winner, thank you so much!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tyler trail

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic item! Arrived earlier than expected and turned out ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic item! Arrived earlier than expected and turned out super handy when clearing the snow pile brought by Jonas. I wasn't able to extend it though hence giving it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Saasha

customer_reviews.title: Remove layer of snow, re-tighten handle, repeat....
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, but should be constructed a bit better. The snow broom does a good job removing snow from the van roof and pick-up truck cover. Unfortunately, the design and construction are a bit on the cheap side. The handle screws into the snow broom.... a smart idea for storage, but a constant problem when using the device. The broom keeps loosening during use and must be constantly re-tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Stengela

customer_reviews.title: BEST SNOW REMOVAL BROOM!!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for years. No scratches when removing snow. Friend's black car was cleaned with a snow brush and she absolutely RUINED her paint job!!!! White scratches EVERYWHERE!! I ordered this for her to use and she loves it!! Whole car has to be buffed out because of her using a snow brush on icy snow. Great gift, too!!
customer_reviews.author: maitai

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, great design though.
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Poor quality. I purchased 2 Snow Joe Telescoping snow broom with ice scraper for each of our cars. During first use use the ice scraper attachment broke. I returned and got a free replacement. During 3rd snowfall the second Snow Joe ice scraper broke and I noticed that the handle spins on the threaded socket so you cannot get enough leverage to clear snow. The storage feature is what sold me on these units. But the quality is not very good. We are in Boston area and entering March soon. I will muddle through the rest of the winter with what's left of these 2 units. When spring comes, they will head for the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: Made with cheap plastic the head possibly flys off
customer_reviews.text: First the negative the pole screw part or the connecting female is made terribly. Plastic. So I ordered 3 for me my wife and daughter. Mine stays connected but head doesn't lock it keeps spinning. My daughters won't stay on and my wife's is a hit or miss on both issues. Positive is that it doesn't hurst the paint. No scuffs, no scratches when the head holds to the pole it's cleans the car great. New York City snow
customer_reviews.author: Big Rob NYC

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 86 years old and live in a retirement village. I ordered this after I saw one of our wonderful maintenance guys with one. It is so light and easy to use that I had fun scooping the snow off my neighbors' cars, too. It wouldn't help on frozen on ice-snow, but for our eight inches of light snow, I felt like a super-hero!
customer_reviews.author: Jean A. Klein

customer_reviews.title: I like how long it is
customer_reviews.text: I like how long it is. I'm short so it's hard to even reach the top of my Civic. But, the foam "broom" doesn't tilt so it's a lot of maneuvering around to get the windows fully cleaned. If there is a curve of any sort, it just kind of packs the snow down so you then have to go back over it with the ice scraper part to get it really cleaned. If there was an actual brush part, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle Hardenstine

customer_reviews.title: Seemed great at first, started to break down quick
customer_reviews.text: If you live in an area with light snow, this could be great. If you ever have to push heavy snow off your car's roof, this is just not sturdy enough to do it, no matter how careful you are. Mine started to break after the second use. It's a shame, because it's a neat design and easy to pack down. I just wish it was stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Schleppy

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this snow "brush' make removing snow from my SUV easy for this 5' 2" granmama, it breaks down in seconds for easy storage. No more trying to find ways to fit groceries in around a long handled brush during those winter months!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for snow, terrible for ice
customer_reviews.text: The large foam pad is amazing for soft snow. Was able to clear 1 ft of snow off my pick-up truck in a couple minutes. However, if the snow freezes or there is ice it fails. The foam pad is too soft to break up frozen snow or ice. The handle has no grip, so it slides through your hands when using the scraper. When sliding through your hands, all scraping power is lost.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Lausberg

customer_reviews.title: God's gift to the snow areas we live in
customer_reviews.text: This is a God send for living in upstate NY and having to clear off an SUV. I hate seeing people driving around in vehicles that are covered in snow, especially the roofs, only to have it blow off and obstruct my vision. Trying to clean off an SUV, even at 6'2" with a snow brush SUCKED!!! This thing makes it so easy I wonder why I never bought one earlier!
customer_reviews.author: Doodles

customer_reviews.title: Better than using a snow brush on heavy snow
customer_reviews.text: Great for removing heavy snowfalls, fast & easy. One of the best in the industry. Will not scratch the finish. Most of our snowfalls are heavy being from the Great Lakes area. The brush bristles flex & ride up under the snows weight. This takes many swipes just to remove a single swipe from Snow Joe. The foam is stiff enough to handle 6" by pull or push from windshield & roof. Most efficient snow removal tool I ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Thor H.

customer_reviews.title: Great to remove fresh snow from your car.
customer_reviews.text: We have outdoor parking and need to brush off snow from our SUV. The foam blade removes inches of snow from the top of our SUV quickly without damaging the finish. The pole telescopes to reach across the hood and roof. Great product. I bought a second one to hold in reserve.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Needed this so I could clean car from one side
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of having to walk around to the other side to clean off snow from SUV and I am not a short guy so I have a decent reach (6'2"). This did two thing extended my reach and not scratch SUV. It's light weight and works well.
customer_reviews.author: ERIK

customer_reviews.title: Best scrapper for a larger vehicle
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our first truck so needed something to reach everything. This was the perfect winter to try this scrapper. Love how it can remove large quantities of snow and the extension makes it easy to reach across vehicle. One is kept in the garage so we can scrap off the vehicle before we open it and the other is kept in the truck. Makes a lot of sense to have a pair of these, especially if you have to park outside.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard50

customer_reviews.title: Slight changes from last model
customer_reviews.text: They changed the threading. I accidentally grabbed the head of this one and the stick from my previous one and trudged out in the snow. Cursing like a sailor ensued. They work pretty good but they have changed some other things. It looks like they're starting to cut corners. Which sucks because I have one from when they first came out and loved it. The dog really loved the foam too, so that's the only reason I got a new one. Progress? Nope.
customer_reviews.author: DenverDawg

product_meta.title: Snow Joe SJBLZD 2-In-1 Telescoping Snow Broom + Ice Scraper | 18-Inch Foam Head (Blue)
product_meta.description: Style:Outdated VersionSNOW PROBLEM! The Snow Joe Snow Broom model SJBLZD makes quick work of removing the snow piled on the roof, hood, trunk or windshield of your vehicle. Its patented dual-purpose design features an oversized 18-inch wide broom head on one end and a built-in ice scraper on the other, so you can quickly push heavy, wet snow off your car, truck or SUV, then clear away the ice build-up on your windshield with just one tool. Its durable, non-abrasive foam head safely and effectively sweeps snow off your vehicle without damaging its paint, trim or glass surfaces. Plus, its telescoping pole extends from 30 to 49 inches to provide maximum reach with minimal strain. Weighing only 1.2 pounds, the Snow Broom is super easy to handle and stores neatly inside the trunk of your car with its built-in bracket holder. GET EQUIPPED this winter with the Snow Joe Snow Broom and clear out fast from tough winter messes.
feature_bullets: Push heavy wet snow away fast
Durable non abrasive foam head is safe on car
Auto-locking extension pole adjusts from 30-inch to 49-inch
Built in Ice Scraper to Clear Away Ice Build-up On Your Windshield

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,386 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
